titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of November 17, 2021, as "National GIS Day".
Expressing support for the designation of November 17, 2021, as "National GIS Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National GIS Day and encourages the continued use of geographic information system (GIS) technology to learn, address societal challenges, and drive economic growth.
